Success Stories

Explore how we solve complex business challenges with modern technology.

Developer Tools
4 years

SkyCodec: Lossless Data Compression Core

Development of low-level compression core and supporting software, from concept and R&D through investor validation and industrial implementation. We joined at concept stage, conducted multi-year research into novel compression transforms and entropy coding, and delivered a production-grade software stack ready for integration in high-throughput systems.

Key Achievement
Patent-pending algorithms; production-ready encoder
C++
Qt
Machine Learning

DAB: Digital Alternative Banking (Fintech SaaS)

End‚Äëto‚Äëend development of a SaaS fintech product enabling entrepreneurs to automate complex accounting workflows and process digital cash terminal transactions inside the app. SoftDAB ran this as an in-house startup; we built the MVP with a 15-person team and shipped core features that validated product-market fit.

Key Achievement
MVP delivered; core accounting flows automated

Automotive
6 months

CarLight: Vehicle Traffic Light Detection

Embedded computer-vision system to detect traffic light phase reliably in challenging real-world conditions (glare, occlusion, varied camera setups). Worked closely with BMW engineers to deliver an in-vehicle MVP that integrates with existing hardware and provides phase detection confidence scores.

Key Achievement
MVP delivered to BMW
C++
Embedded Vision
View Case Study

30 months (2.5 years)

SoftPokerPro: AI-Powered Poker Assistant

Development of a high-performance multiplayer poker solution with advanced OCR, ML-based pattern recognition, and game-logic optimization. Focus on low-latency real-time processing, robust OCR across multiple visual feeds, and scalable server-side components.

Key Achievement
Real‚Äëtime OCR + decision engine; high throughput

Rosco Group: Agri-Sector E‚ÄëCommerce Platform

Built a large, production-grade e-commerce store for a leading agricultural retailer in Ukraine. The platform supports complex catalogs, pricing, B2B workflows, and high-traffic events with a focus on resilience and operational efficiency.

Logistics
6 months

GST Cloud: Automated Seal Tracking System

First-in-market cloud service for automated tracking of security seals. The mobile/cloud system records seal events with photos, assigns responsibility, and triggers alerts for re-sealing when seals expire ‚Äî providing a full audit trail for logistics and security operations.

Key Achievement
Cloud tracking, photo evidence, and re-seal alerting
React Native
PostgreSQL / NoSQL
Machine Learning
